If you're looking for some help learning data science or if you need some help with a particular data science project, I'm available for short-term consulting!

The kinds of things I can help you with include:

**Teaching workshops on**

Programming:

- R

- Python

- SQL

- Git/GitHub

- Shell/UNIX

Doing data science:

- Data cleaning

- Data visualization

- Data science workflows


**Data science consulting**

- Helping develop an impactful data visualization

- Help you develop a consistent data science workflow

- Help you prepare some complex data for analysis

- Help you with an analysis plan

- and more!


Email me at rebecca.barter@hsc.utah.edu to see if your needs might be a good fit for my services!
